column3: If you are going to open PRs like this, please at least put the justification / reasoning in the PR description, use a properly formatted and explanatory commit message and ensure that the change is completely correct before opening.

I apologise - I wrongly assumed the icons are of the same size.
As for the reasoning, I thought it was obvious that duplicate files are not needed.

Would it be okay to set the project logo to bitcoin32.png and update PR description/commit message?
